sentences.sContent: "I was looking for Sally," he blurted, and his eyes filled with tears.
sentences.sCn: 他眼含热泪，突然脱口说道：“我在找莎丽。”

synos.tran: 未加思索地冲口说出；突然说出

remMethod.val: 脱口而出(blurt)的话往往容易伤人(hurt)

trans.tranOther: If someone blurts something, they say it suddenly, after trying hard to keep quiet or to keep it secret
